name: Toilet Paper Guardians: Poo-Paper-Guardians
description:
THE REAL GAME OF THRONES

Looking for something to do this quarantine? We've got just the thing! Introducing Toilet Paper Guardians in Poo-Paper-Geddon!

Designed to be played in any environment (especially on the toilet), Toilet Paper Guardians in Poo-Paper-Geddon is a game about protecting grannies and toilet paper stashes in a giant supermarket battle!
